description: When shaping the domain, domain concepts are nouns, behaviors are verbs

content: Examples: Animation, Power Item, Sequence, Configuration
Describe what the concept IS first, then what it DOES
Use verbs to describe behaviors on concepts: Resolves animation, Executes when triggered
If a verb has its own state/logic, make it a noun concept
Transform actions into domain concepts when they have state

dont.description: Don't name domain concepts as verbs or gerunds
content: Don't name domain concepts as verbs or gerunds
Don't use '-ing' forms for concept names
Don't create separate concepts for 'Doing X' vs 'X'
Wrong: Combine them - always lead with what the thing IS
